      • register

        public UserDto register​(UserDto user)
                 throws ResourceAlreadyExistsException
        Handle user registration from the data provide in the form of DTO with firstname, lastname, email and password. Password will be encoded and email will be checked to ensure email uniqueness. The new user is saved in the database.
        Specified by:
        register in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        user - to register
        Returns:
        UserDto of the registered user
        Throws:
        ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if email already exists

      • update

        public UserDto update​(UserDto userUpdate)
               throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                      ResourceAlreadyExistsException
        Handle user update from the data provide in the form of DTO. If email has benn changed, it will be checked. If password field is left blank or null it won't be updated, else the new password will be encoded and the user updated in the database.
        Specified by:
        update in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        userUpdate - update
        Returns:
        UserDto of the updated user
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found
        ResourceAlreadyExistsException - if email already exists

      • setAccountEnabling

        public void setAccountEnabling​(int id,
                               boolean enable)
                        throws ResourceNotFoundException
        Set user enabling to authenticate.
        Specified by:
        setAccountEnabling in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        enable - to update
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found

      • deleteById

        public void deleteById​(int id)
                throws ResourceNotFoundException,
                       ForbiddenOperationException
        Delete a user by checking if wallet amount is null and clearing connections with other users. All onUserDeletion() method of observer service will be called before deleting the user from the database.
        Specified by:
        deleteById in interface UserService
        Parameters:
        id - of the user
        Throws:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if user not found
        ForbiddenOperationException - if user wallet isn't empty
